description: Terminates a running application or process on Windows by either its name or PID. Supports forceful termination of multiple processes matching the name, logs all actions, and outputs structured JSON suitable for SOC automation.

script_parameters.name: LogPath
script_parameters.description: Path to the rotating human-readable script log.

script_parameters.name: ARLog
script_parameters.description: Path where the active response JSON result will be stored. Uses overwrite-safe NDJSON logging.

user_prompts.prompt: Enter the application name or PID to terminate
user_prompts.description: Specify either a process name (e.g., chrome) or a PID to target for termination.
